text: Anata gata no omo ga, ādamu no shison no sebone kara kare-ra no shison o toridasa re, kare-ra o mizukara no shōnin to nasa reta toki o omoe. (Sonotoki kare wa ōse rareta. ) `Ware wa, anata gata no omode wanai ka.' Kare-ra wa mōshiageta. `Hai, watashi-tachi wa shōgen itashimasu.' Koreha fukkatsu no hi ni anata gata ni,`watashi-tachi wa, kono koto o hontōni chūi shimasendeshita.' To iwa senai tamedearu
